Name: Terror Time
About the game: 'Terror Time' is a classic tower defense game in an unusual and bright setting. Defend the base and get upgrade points. Hordes of enemies will try to break through the defenses. Give them a hard fight with Terror Time. Protect the approaches to your base, withstand several attacks using 10 types of cool weapons with the possibility of their improvements. Game Features: Classic gameplay 10 levels 10 types of towers 10 kinds of enemies Steam Achievements support
Meta Title: Terror Time: Oct 14, 2022, Sweety Boy and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Terror Time? Check out the release date (Oct 14, 2022), developer insights from Sweety Boy, and a complete game summary.
